description: Listed building consent for Installation of a roof window on the existing rear extension. Replacement of existing rear window to a door and enlargement of the existing rear elevation door.
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposal because of design and appearance would harm the special architectural and historic significance of the Grade II Listed Building Listed Building and would also be an inappropriate development which fails to preserve of the Bedford Park Article 4 Conservation area contrary to Local Plan Policies CC1 (Context and Character), CC2 (Urban Design and Architecture) and CC4 (Heritage) and the intent of NPPF.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
LPA ref: 01234/20/L18 - Listed building consent for erection of a single storey rear infill extension, side and rear roof dormers, internal alterations and layout changes to all floors, replacement staircase, reinstatement of cellar, demolition of existing pergola and erection of detached outbuilding. Granted 20.12.2023

LPA ref: 01234/20/P15 - Planning permission for erection of a single storey rear infill extension, side and rear roof dormers, internal alterations and layout
changes to all floors, replacement staircase, reinstatement of cellar, demolition of existing pergola and erection of detached outbuilding. Granted 20.12.2023

Lawful Development Certificate  (proposed) application - submitted with this listed building consent application
